====== Feature type

|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:plot-description-protocol-shapes:landform-pattern:feature-type`
|Label | Feature type

|Comment | TERN's ecologists have determined the feature type is _landform_, defined by the link:https://www.publish.csiro.au/book/5230/[Australian Soil and Land Survey Field Handbook].
